courseDetails.title: Business Fundamentals: How to Start a Business
courseDetails.shortDescription: A guide to starting a business, whatever your circumstances
courseDetails.longDescription:
Business Fundamentals: How to Start a Business: A guide to starting a business, whatever your circumstances

Starting a business is daunting for many people.

It is a dream for many of us.

I have put this course together to help clarify and hopefully simplify some of the steps you need to take to ensure you are starting on the right footing.


The best suggestion I can give you is to take your time, but be determined, resilient and explore as many options as possible for every aspect.

Starting, owning or being part of a business can be very rewarding.

It is one of the most fulfilling things you can do, where you have much more control over outcomes, products, services, etc.

It is different from working for someone in so many ways.

However, it can be a lot of work.

The work pays off in fulfilment, financial rewards, community recognition and so many other ways.

The opportunities to start or run businesses are all around us.

Maybe you have been laid off, retired, have an overwhelming urge or just need some extra income, as we all seem to do these days. starting a business is one of the best things you should consider.

There are many types of business, with various motivations, across numerous sectors, services and products.

I will be frank and open about the level of input required from a business owner and you have to access whether you can give that to it or can learn to over time, or you want to get someone else to do that with you and so on.

Assessment Description:

The Chief Security Officer (CSO) assessment is a comprehensive evaluation designed to gauge the knowledge, skills, and expertise of individuals aspiring to or currently holding the position of a CSO within an organization. This assessment consists of 30 multiple-choice questions that cover various aspects of security management and practices. The questions are carefully crafted to assess the candidate's understanding of security principles, risk management, incident response, access control, network security, and other crucial areas related to the role of a CSO.


The importance of Chief Security Officer Assessment cannot be overstated, both for employees and companies. For employees, it serves as a platform to demonstrate their competence and expertise in security management. It allows them to showcase their knowledge of industry best practices, emerging threats, and the ability to develop and implement effective security strategies. By successfully completing the assessment, employees can strengthen their credibility and increase their chances of career advancement in the field of security management.


For companies, the Chief Security Officer Assessment plays a vital role in ensuring that the individual appointed or promoted to the CSO position possesses the necessary skills and knowledge to safeguard the organization's assets. Security is a critical aspect of any business, and having a competent CSO is essential for protecting sensitive information, mitigating risks, and ensuring business continuity. By conducting this assessment, companies can identify individuals who demonstrate a deep understanding of security management principles and are capable of leading the organization's security efforts effectively.


Moreover, the Chief Security Officer Assessment helps companies identify any skill gaps or areas that require further development within their existing security management team. It enables organizations to benchmark their security professionals against industry standards and identify areas of improvement. This assessment also aids in identifying potential candidates for training programs or professional development initiatives, allowing companies to invest in their employees' growth and enhance the overall security posture of the organization.


In terms of career building, a strong foundation in security management is highly beneficial. With the increasing frequency and sophistication of cyber and physical threats, organizations across various industries are placing significant emphasis on their security measures. This has created a high demand for skilled security professionals, including CSOs. By developing expertise in security management, individuals can position themselves for rewarding career opportunities in a wide range of sectors, such as finance, healthcare, technology, government, and more.


Professionals who excel in security management possess a unique skill set that includes risk assessment, incident response, policy development, compliance, and the ability to align security objectives with business goals. They play a crucial role in protecting organizations from internal and external threats, ensuring compliance with regulations, and building a culture of security awareness.


Furthermore, a successful career in security management often involves continuous learning and staying updated with the latest trends, technologies, and threats in the field. Professionals who demonstrate a commitment to ongoing professional development and acquire relevant certifications can enhance their marketability and open doors to higher-level positions, such as Chief Information Security Officer (CISO) or executive leadership roles.


In conclusion, the Chief Security Officer Assessment serves as a valuable tool for both employees and companies. It enables employees to demonstrate their expertise in security management and advance their careers in a rapidly growing field. For companies, this assessment ensures that they have competent leaders in place to protect their valuable assets and mitigate risks. Security management is a critical aspect of modern business operations, and individuals who excel in this field can carve out rewarding and impactful careers while safeguarding the interests of organizations in an ever-evolving threat landscape.

courseDetails.title: EXCEL para principiantes enfocado a los  negocios
courseDetails.shortDescription: »Curso Excel pensando en principiantes para productividad en los negocios y empresas actualizado a la ultima versión «
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿Alguna vez te has preguntado cómo empresas usan Excel en el manejo de sus datos?


Realizado con la ultima versión disponible para 2021 de este programa. Este curso persigue que los estudiantes adquieran destrezas en el uso de Excel, pero con un enfoque orientado  a los negocios. 

Al finalizar el curso, podrás crear archivos tales como: Nóminas, informes financieros, gráficos estadísticos, presupuestos y todo documento relacionado con hojas de cálculo . Este curso va desde los conocimientos más básicos del programa hasta prepararte para llegar al nivel más avanzado

He diseñado este curso de Excel para que todo principiante pueda crear archivos de hojas de calculo, por lo que te garantizamos un aprendizaje amplio y rápido.

Al final de curso tendrás disponible una serie de repositorios web para que puedas alcanzar el nivel avanzado de este programa.

Las aplicaciones de Excel son prácticas, pero también pueden ser divertidas. Veamos cuáles son algunos de los mejores usos del programa:

  • Cálculo: Puedes crear una calculadora personalizada en Excel para operaciones matemáticas que tengas que realizar a menudo. Simplemente tendrás que insertar las cifras y tendrás la solución.

  • Contabilidad: Desde crear informes financieros hasta registrar gastos y elaborar presupuestos, según estadísticas reveladas por GoSkills, un 89% de compañías usan Excel por sus funciones de contabilidad. Hay muchas plantillas gratuitas que puedes usar para tal fin.

  • Gráficos: En vez de mostrar tus datos en una hoja de cálculo puedes transformarlos en un gráfico visual y fácil de interpretar.

  • Registro de inventario: Puedes mantener un registro muy sencillo de tu inventario en Excel.

  • Calendarios y horarios: Ya sea para planear tu semana o fijar las reuniones para todo el equipo, en Excel puedes crear un horario muy claro dividido por colores para mejorar tu organización.

  • Fijar metas: Puedes usar las hojas de cálculo para crear un planning de metas. Imaginemos que te propones ir al gimnasio 3 veces a la semana: podrías colocar tu meta en una columna, tu objetivo en otra y después ir marcando cada día de la semana que lo consigas para poder marcar la casilla de ‘alcanzado’ al ir el tercer día. El sistema visual te motivará.

  • Elabora prototipos: Si estás diseñando una página web puedes usar Excel para crear los prototipos de algunos elementos.

  • Lista de tareas: En Excel puedes crear una lista de tareas y registrar con porcentajes lo cerca que estas de completar cada una de ellas.

  • Lista de ‘quehaceres’: Puedes apuntar todas las tareas más pequeñas que tengas que hacer, como mandar un correo o comprar leche, y tacharlo de tu lista de ‘quehaceres’ en Excel.

  • Repartir tareas: Crea gráficos de distintos estilos para repartir tareas entre los miembros de tu equipo. Podréis marcarlo en el gráfico cuando esté completo e incluso distribuirlo estilo Trello.

  • Mantén un registro del tiempo: Si quieres aprender a gestionar mejor tu tiempo puedes mantener un registro de los minutos u horas que tardas en completar cada acción. Con el cálculo automático puedes ver cuántas horas has trabajado en la semana y compararlo con lo que has logrado.

  • Crea formularios: Los menús desplegables que puedes añadir en las celdas en Excel lo convierten en una herramienta fantástica para crear formularios.

  • Prepara facturas: También puedes preparar facturas en Excel. De hecho, hay algunas plantillas gratuitas diseñadas para ello.

  • Planea un viaje: En Excel puedes planear el itinerario de tu próximo viaje, incluso tienen una plantilla diseñada especialmente para tal fin.

  • Crea un sudoku: Puedes usar Excel para divertirte y entrenar la mente creando Sudokus.

  • Mantén un registro de tus logros: Ya sea los kilos que has perdido en una semana o los restaurantes que has visitado en el último mes, puedes mantener un registro de tus logros en Excel y usar los cálculos automáticos para ver el resultado final.

  • Calcular el IVA: Puedes usar las hojas de cálculo de Excel para calcular el IVA.

  • Crea listas de invitados: Puedes registrar todos los detalles de tus invitados, junto a su dirección para organizarte mejor. Además, si se trata de un evento de networking, por ejemplo, puedes imprimir los nombres de los invitados de manera rápida y sencilla y crear etiquetas para que se identifiquen.

  • Crea un CRM: Lo bueno de crear tu CRM en Excel es que será más personalizable. Además, hay bastantes plantillas disponibles para tal fin.

Te espero en el curso.

"... And medicine, law, business, engineering, these are noble pursuits and necessary to sustain life. But poetry, beauty, romance, love, these are what we stay alive for." - N.H. Kleinbaum, Dead Poets Society


Did you always wanted to write but ended up thinking "Should I write? Will I be able to do this? More importantly, Will I be able to do this right?"  In this online Creative Writing course, we will help you find your own answers to these questions, and start your journey in the fine art of Writing.


What is creative writing?


Writing has many different purposes. Some writing informs the audience, others report. Some writing, however, exists to tell a story or express an idea that falls outside of the rules-based writing. Creative writing involves any writing that tries to tell a story to the readers, in any format.  Creative writing has many forms, including but not limited to Poetry, Literature.


Why should you take this course?


In this online course on Creative Writing, we dive into  the true essence of becoming a skilled writer. We'll help you connect between innate talent and passion for the craft with fundamental techniques. 


Join us as we challenge preconceived notions, develop your unique writing style and tone, and equip you with the essential tools of writing. Whether you're a beginner seeking to ignite your passion for writing or a seasoned writer striving for breakthroughs, this course provides a nurturing environment for growth and exploration. Learn to craft captivating narratives, breathe life into memorable characters, and ignite emotions through your words


Unleash your imagination, embrace unconventional thinking, and defy the limits of traditional storytelling.


One day you might end up writing something as inspirational as: "O Captain! My Captain ... "


Carpe Diem and enroll today!
targetAudiences: Anyone who wants to start Writing seriously
Writers of all levels, at any stage in their creative journey
Writers of all genres and forms

courseDetails.title: Life Coaching Certification Program

Embark on a transformative journey that will empower you with dynamic tools and strategies needed to guide your clients toward their most fulfilling lives. Whether you're an aspiring coach, a seasoned professional looking to expand your toolkit, or someone passionate about personal growth and helping others, this course is your gateway to a rewarding career and a life of profound impact."
targetAudiences: This life coaching course is tailored for driven individuals yearning to make a tangible difference in people's lives. Ideal for aspirational coaches, therapists, and those in helping professions. It's equally valuable to anyone eager to gain powerful insights into human behaviour and motivational strategies. No prior coaching experience is necessary - only a passion for personal development and a desire to unlock potential in others.

courseDetails.title: Build a Modern REST API with PHP 8
courseDetails.shortDescription: Build from scratch a clean PHP 8.2 backend API based on scalable and powerful N-Tier architecture
courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you eager to master the art of building professional and efficient REST APIs using the latest features of PHP 8? Look no further! This comprehensive Udemy course will equip you with all the necessary skills and knowledge to create robust n-tier RESTful APIs using PHP 8.2.


Whether you are a seasoned PHP developer or a beginner looking to dive into API development, this course is designed to cater to your needs. Through a hands-on approach, you'll learn step-by-step how to design, build, and secure a fully functional REST API from scratch.


Starting with the fundamentals, you'll gain a solid understanding of the REST architectural style and its principles. You'll explore the HTTP protocol and learn how to leverage its methods and status codes to create API endpoints that adhere to industry standards.


As you progress, you'll delve into the world of PHP 8, discovering its latest features and enhancements that make API development more streamlined and efficient. You'll learn how to set up your development environment, configure PHP for optimal performance, and harness the power of the PHP 8 syntax (such as the `match` expression, the PHP 8.1 `enums`, and so much more!).


Throughout the course, you'll work on real-world projects, allowing you to apply your knowledge to practical scenarios. You'll learn how to handle authentication and authorization, implement CRUD operations, handle error responses, and optimize your API for scalability and performance.


Moreover, you'll explore best practices and design patterns for building clean, maintainable, and testable code. You'll become familiar with popular PHP frameworks and libraries that simplify the API development process, such as Laravel, Lumen, and Slim.


In addition to these frameworks, you'll also utilize essential Composer packages like RedBean and DotEnv PHP. RedBean provides an easy-to-use ORM (Object-Relational Mapping) solution for database management, while DotEnv PHP allows you to manage environment variables effortlessly, enhancing the security and portability of your API.


By the end of this course, you'll have a solid foundation in creating RESTful APIs using PHP 8 and be ready to tackle complex API projects with confidence. Whether you're building APIs for mobile applications, web services, or IoT devices, this course will empower you to unleash the full potential of PHP 8 for API development.


Enrol the course now and embark on a journey to become a proficient REST API developer with PHP 8!
targetAudiences: Anyone who needs to build a REST API from scratch with PHP
Anyone seeking to build a real-world PHP API, from start to end
Anyone wishing to level up their skills in building complex PHP API applications
Anyone looking to work with PHP 8 for Web development
Level up your skillset and confidence in PHP / OOP for building complex applications (e.g. APIs)
Anyone looking to build an API from the very beginning to the end, including clean code, good practices and design patterns
